channel.title: Regan Vaccaro's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content on Regan Vaccaro's GitHub Site

item.title: Is Nebraska the best 3 win team in college football?
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(cfbfastR) library(ggbump) yr <- cfbfastR:::most_recent_season() pbp <- cfbfastR::load_cfb_pbp(yr) team_info = cfbfastR::cfbd_team_info(year = yr) team_colors_logos = team_info %>% select(school, abbreviation, color, logos, alt_color) %>% unnest(logos) %>% group_by(school) %>% slice(1) %>% ungroup() nudrives <- cfbd_drives(2021, team = "Nebraska") nudrives <- nudrives %>% mutate( chart_yards = case_when( defense == "Nebraska" ~ as.numeric(yards)*-1, defense != "Nebraska" ~ as.numeric(yards))) %>% mutate(Opponent = case_when( offense == "Nebraska" ~ defense, defense == "Nebraska" ~ offense)) %>% mutate(simple_drive_result = case_when( drive_result == "DOWNS" ~ "Bad", drive_result == "END OF 4TH QUARTER" ~ "Neutral", drive_result == "END OF GAME" ~ "Neutral", drive_result == "END OF HALF" ~ "Neutral", drive_result == "FG" ~ "Good", drive_result == "FUMBLE" ~ "Bad", drive_result == "FUMBLE TD" ~ "Disaster", drive_result == "INT" ~ "Bad", drive_result == "INT TD" ~ "Disaster", drive_result == "MISSED FG" ~ "Bad", drive_result == "PUNT" ~ "Bad", drive_result == "PUNT RETURN TD" ~ "Disaster", drive_result == "PUNT TD" ~ "Disaster", drive_result == "SF" ~ "Disaster", drive_result == "TD" ~ "Good")) ggplot() + geom_bar(data=nudrives, aes(x=drive_number, weight=chart_yards, fill=simple_drive_result )) + scale_fill_manual(values=c("red","mediumorchid4","darkgreen", "gray"))+ coord_flip() + scale_x_reverse() + facet_wrap(~Opponent)+ guides(fill=guide_legend("Drive Result"))+ labs(x="Drive Number", y="Yards", title="A Season Full of Good, Bad, & Ugly", subtitle="Nebraska's 2021 season was marked by self-destruction & plenty of almost there moments.

item.title: Carles Gil or Daniel Salloi : Who is the better pick for MLS MVP?
item.description: Dániel Sallói and Carles Gil are two players that have undoubtedly made a sizable impact on their programs since their start. With Sallói coming into Sporting Kansas City at just 20 years old in 2016, and Gil arriving at the New England Revolution in 2019, both have made their way to the leader boards. Playing at a striker position for much of his career with KC, Sallói has scored a total of 34 goals with the team with 16 of those being game-winning goals.

item.title: Bad Football
item.description: I’m going to do my homework. library(reactable) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.7 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.0.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() For this I will look at bad football.

item.title: About Regan Vaccaro
item.description: Regan Vaccaro is a junior Sports Media & Communications student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. She is from Overland Park, Kansas.
